para.programlisting: (defconst my-style ; indent the current line from anywhere '((c-tab-always-indent . t) (c-auto-newline . t) (c-hanging-braces-alist . ( (brace-list-intro) (namespace-open) (inline-open) (block-open) (brace-list-open) (brace-list-close) (brace-entry-open) (brace-else-brace) (brace-elseif-brace) (class-open after) (class-close) (defun-open after) (defun-close) (extern-lang-open) (inexpr-class-open) (statement-open) (substatement-open) (inexpr-class-close))) (c-hanging-colons-alist . ((member-init-intro before) (inher-intro) (case-label after) (label after) (access-label after))) (c-offsets-alist . ( (innamespace . 0) (case-label . 2) )) (c-cleanup-list . ( (scope-operator) (empty-defun-braces) (brace-else-brace) (brace-elseif-brace) (defun-close-semi) (list-close-comma) ) ) ;; no automatic newlines after ';' if following line non-blank or inside ;; one-line inline methods (add-to-list 'c-hanging-semi&comma-criteria 'c-semi&comma-no-newlines-before-nonblanks) (add-to-list 'c-hanging-semi&comma-criteria 'c-semi&comma-no-newlines-for-oneline-inliners) ; (knr-argdecl-intro . -) (c-echo-syntactic-information-p . t) ) "My GNU Programming Style")
